main_question: Why is British Columbia known as Canada's Pacific Gateway?
possible_answers: A. Because billions of dollars in goods are shipped to and from Asia
B. Because it has Pacific Ocean on its coastline
C. Because many people of Asian origin live there
D. Because it attracts many tourists all year round
answer: A. Because billions of dollars in goods are shipped to and from Asia
explanatory_sentence: British Columbia is known for its majestic mountains and as Canada's Pacific gateway.
